head.supplied: Melbourne Bot. Garden ¶ 11/3/69 ¶ Sir ¶ ¶ I have the honor to inform you that great difficulty has arisen at the Royal Park for maintaining order and obedience to the regulations in consequence of no...

div.p: To the [President of the Board of Land and Works]
A345 Royal Park Zoological Society letter and minute book, p. 29-30, Mitchell Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; text-align: end;

div.p:
get name.
This is J M Grant, who held the title as well as Commissioner of crown Lands and Survey, see Govt Gazette July 11 1868, p. 1269; But I have left the correspondent as is but it should be changed when the file is proofed.
Melbourne Bot. Garden

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; text-align: end;

div.p: I have the honor to inform you that great difficulty has arisen at the Royal Park for maintaining order and obedience to the regulations in consequence of no official appointment of a bailiff having as yet been made since the resignation of Mr Sprigg. The trustees of the Royal Park on the 27th Oct. 1868 submitted for your favorable consideration that the present superintendent of the park Mr Eugene Lissignol might as a honorary officer be entrusted also by the Board of Land and Works with the power of acting as Crownland Ranger like his predecessor. Great damage has since arisen there in consequence of mutilation of fences, invasion of cattle and even by open and insulting disregard to the Rules of the Board of Land and Works, so much so that the present custodian of the ground is all but powerless in any attempted exercise of his function.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor to be

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
The honorable the President of the Board of Land and Works.
Sdd info from minutes.
